com.artemis

Class BaseSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AspectSubscriptionManager, BaseEntitySystem, ComponentManager, EntityManager, GroupManager, Manager, TagManager

    public abstract class BaseSystem
extends Object
    Most basic system. Upon calling world.process(), your systems are processed in sequence. Flow: initialize() - Initialize your system, on top of the dependency injection. begin() - Called before the entities are processed. processSystem() - Called once per cycle. end() - Called after the entities have been processed.
    See Also:
    Wire

      The world this system belongs to.

      • world

        protected World world
        The world this system belongs to.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseSystem

        public BaseSystem()

    • Method Detail

      • begin

        protected void begin()
        Called before system processing begins.

        Nota Bene: Any entities created in this method won't become active until the next system starts processing or when a new processing rounds begins, whichever comes first.

      • process

        public final void process()
        Process system. Does nothing if checkProcessing() is false or the system is disabled.
        See Also:
        InvocationStrategy

      • processSystem

        protected abstract void processSystem()
        Process the system.

      • end

        protected void end()
        Called after the systems has finished processing.

      • checkProcessing

        protected boolean checkProcessing()
        Does the system desire processing. Useful when the system is enabled, but only occasionally needs to process. This only affects processing, and does not affect events or subscription lists.
        Returns:
        true if the system should be processed, false if not.
        See Also:
        both must be true before the system will process.

      • initialize

        protected void initialize()
        Override to implement code that gets executed when systems are initialized. Note that artemis native types like systems, factories and component mappers are automatically injected by artemis.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Check if the system is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if enabled, otherwise false

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enabled systems run during process(). This only affects processing, and does not affect events or subscription lists. Systems are enabled by default.
        Parameters:
        enabled - system will not run when set to false
        See Also:
        both must be true before the system will process.

      • setWorld

        protected void setWorld(World world)
        Set the world this system works on.
        Parameters:
        world - the world to set

      • getWorld

        protected World getWorld()
        Get the world associated with the manager.
        Returns:
        the associated world

      • dispose

        protected void dispose()
        see World.dispose()
